content: chicken square 1 knit or crochet a square 2 fold it into a triangle and close the sides stuff it before you close it completely 3 crochet on* 4st in a circle in the place where you wish to make the beak or ch4 and make a circle continue with step 4 and sew the beak on when done 4 sc4 decrease 2 slip_stitch fo and hide thread in the stuffing 5 crochet on* 5st in a line from front to back on the head where you wish to make the comb or ch5 continue with step 6 and sew comb on when done 6 ch1 turn double_crochet in second stitch slip_stitch chain double_crochet slip_stitch chain double_crochet fo hide thread in stuffing 7 make an eye on each side and hide thread in stuffing 8 your little chick is done © copyright - all rights reserved onderdeeijk 2023 * check how to on image below abbreviations chain chain double_crochet double_crochet fo fasten_off single_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch st stich es pattern is not to be shared physically or digitally selling items made from this pattern is allowed on a small scale if you share a photo of your item please refer to onderdeeijk when in doubt send me a message via my etsy shop
